text: alm taelam - 'ayuha alnabiu - 'ana allah yusabbih lah man fi alsmwat wal'ard min almkhlwqat, waltayr safaat ajnhtha fi alsama' tusabih rbha? kl mkhlwq qad arshdh allah kayf yusaliy lah wysbhh. wahu subhanah elym, muttalie ealaa ma yafealuh kl eabid wmsbbih, la yakhfaa ealayh minha shy', wsyjazyhm bdhlk
